name: raise a amogus +
description:
raise a amongus is back, but in plus!

The amogus has new friends to buy so he can be never alone!

New items to be bought!

New items are now avaible to buy!

Examples!:

Richer Blue!

And also... many more.

Secrets to be uncovered!

Ah yes, the classics.

Easter eggs!

The secret stuff that devs hide for their own good.

There is gonna be loads of easter eggs in this!

New biomes!

You thought that you will be forever sealed in the ship?

No! cause theres  new explorable locations!

  • Desert - The sun's energy is strong, but new people are to be found here!

But, who is he?

  • Forest - Yes, a tree filled location, along with an shop in here.

HELP ME, THIS IS NOT REAL

  • Underwater - glogogogo (shop in here too)

And much more too!

Why a early release when you could plan a release date?

Well this is a passion project and i wanna get the game done now.

How is the game going to be?

Well, keep up with this list for planned features, such as:

  • Working Endings System
  • Minigames Hub
  • Dev Art Book (things that i made in ibis)

And many more!

When will a download be Available?

When the game gets in state for it to be called finished.

How will you fix bugs?

Discussion boards are pretty useful, especially when its about bugs, Also feedback makes me very happi :D
